roleset.note: AUTHORIZE-V NOTES: Note that the subordinate agent can be passivized: "The railroadcompany was authorized to buy back..." This justifies splitting thesubordinate S. (from authorize.01-v)
AUTHORIZATION-N NOTES: Added due to expansion of Nombank. Comparison to 'authorize.01' No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from authorization.01-n)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: Rymer Foods Inc. said its board authorized the purchase of as many as 500,000 of its common stock purchase warrants at a price of $4 a warrant.

example.name: agent and action
example.text: Norfolk Southern Corp. directors authorized the railroad company to buy back as many as 45 million of its shares, which would have a current value of more than $1.7 billion.
example.arg: to buy back as many as 45 million of its shares, which would have a current value of more than $1.7 billion
